entry.title: AbdulmalekAlshugaa/netly-rn-expo: Netly-rn-expo is a lightweight React Native package for displaying a network status toast that notifies users about their internet connection status in real time. It supports detecting when the network is lost, restored, or becomes slow.
entry.content: Netly-rn-expo is a lightweight React Native package for displaying a network status toast that notifies users about their internet connection status in real time. It supports detecting when the network is lost, restored, or becomes slow.

entry.title: rahil1202/electron-react-vite-template: A complete setup for building a cross-platform desktop application using React (frontend), Vite (development tooling), Node.js (backend), and Electron (desktop environment). This project serves as a template for developers looking to build modern desktop applications with a lightweight backend.
entry.content: A complete setup for building a cross-platform desktop application using React (frontend), Vite (development tooling), Node.js (backend), and Electron (desktop environment). This project serves as a template for developers looking to build modern desktop applications with a lightweight backend.
